name: Containment
description: A stabilizing bias that holds, shelters, and protects. Often found in cities with Saturn-Moon overlays and Shaiva lineage. Associated with the Refuge archetype.

name: Purification
description: A catalytic bias that burns away impurities, initiates transformation, and forges new forms. Linked to Mars-Ketu overlays and Agni lineage. Associated with Crucible archetypes.

name: Clarity
description: A revealing bias that illuminates, signals, and defines civic identity. Emerges from Sun-Mercury overlays and Solar lineage. Associated with Signal archetypes.

name: Ambiguity
description: A deepening bias that invites mystery, complexity, and nonlinear transformation. Linked to Rahu-Moon overlays and Tantric lineage. Associated with Labyrinth archetypes.

name: Memory
description: A preserving bias that archives lineage, semantic continuity, and ancestral logic. Found in Jupiter-Mercury overlays and Vedic lineage. Associated with Archive archetypes.
